SELECT T.*,spec.name as spec_name FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ord.id AS order_id, ord.order_no, order_product_rel.id AS order_product_rel_id, product.title AS product_name, product.id as product_id FROM t_order ord LEFT JOIN t_order_product_rel order_product_rel ON order_product_rel.order_id = ord.id LEFT JOIN t_product product ON order_product_rel.product_id = product.id ORDER BY ord.order_no ) T LEFT JOIN t_order_product_spec_rel spec_rel ON spec_rel.order_product_rel_id = T.order_product_rel_id LEFT JOIN t_product_spec spec ON spec.id = spec_rel.spec_id
AND T.order_no = #{orderNo}
